all_questions.question: What is the primary task of the neural network in this document?
all_questions.context: A brief summary for those who have not really worked with a neural network so far.

all_questions.question: How do the hidden neurons in the neural network separate points into different categories?
all_questions.context: Each of these hidden neurons, each of these three neurons in the hidden layer, has the capacity of separating points on one side of the line and points from points on the other side of the line.

all_questions.question: What happens to the weights of the neural network during training?
all_questions.context: These three lines of each of these neurons will be positioned randomly and it will not work. But very quickly, it will realize that it can use these three lines to cut like a triangle.

all_questions.question: How does the final neuron in the neural network make its decision?
all_questions.context: So then the final neuron, which combines these three hidden ones, only checks whether all the neurons fired the correct side.

all_questions.question: What kind of training data is necessary for this type of neural network?
all_questions.context: Training data are many points in this space that are manually labeled for the color.
